name: Type Commander
description:
With the LD32 theme being 'An Unconventional Weapon' I went into the Compo thinking about using words as weapons, after a small brainstorming session I figured I wanted to make a typing RPG. In the end I decided an RPG would require too much art so I went with this idea as I already had the ground work built.

There are 10 levels see if you can type your way to the end. I have beaten it, but it might take a try or two for your first time. Also the coolest part of my game is losing, just so you know.
